metadata.description:
"A cloud in the sky,
Drifting on a journey far,
Traveling like me."

"Travelling" is a cinematic animation hand drawn and animated by the illustrator and animator Rodger Liukane.
It reflects that moment where space and time literally stop.
Train lover, the artist wants to describe the peaceful moment when travelling, without any specific purpose or train station to stop.
He used real footage from a trip in Tōkyō (2017) to complete this art piece, you can heard the Yamanote sound in background.

Approx. working time: 40hr
Created with Procreate, AfterEffects, Illustrator and Photoshop
MP4 in 4K [3840x2160]
metadata.name: Travelling #1/40
